title: Preventing the Inevitable at Il Lombardia: Can Anybody Torpedo the End of a ‘Perfect Season’ for Pogacar?
content:
Preview: No Roglič or Alaphilippe, but Evenepoel, Pidcock, Jorgenson look to pull the impossible and prevent Pogačar’s fourth-straight win in Italian monument.

Read the full article at Preventing the Inevitable at Il Lombardia: Can Anybody Torpedo the End of a ‘Perfect Season’ for Pogacar? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
